text_block_list.text: —— Compatriots, art thou ready for battle?

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
Our time hath come. A once in a lifetime opportunity lies 
before us. We shall impress upon them our terrifying might!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Rise up! This is our rebellioooon—!!
This spring's Fan Festival is just around the corner. As for the horsegirls participating in a certain thrilling event…

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Hmm…… This should do it for the coming month.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Yaeno～♪ It sounds like the Clan Assignments are about to start. Let's go— Oh my, are you in the middle of planning your new training?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: I was, though I have made only a few modifications, nothing too different from last month. Little strokes fell great oaks… constant perseverance will lead one to great results.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
I have just finished, so let us head there together. 
'Twill be exciting to see how the lineups turn out.

text_block_list.name: Executive Committee Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Alright～ Has everyone drawn a lot? On my signal, open it up and divide into clans I, Ro, Ha, Ni, Ho, He, and To accordingly. Aaaand — go!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: —— Oh my, you drew I too, Taishin? We're in the same clan then♪

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Mm… Wait, you're participating? That's kinda surprising.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Oh now, I'm actually fairly acquainted with sword fighting. 
I did a lot of such play acting at my parent's daycare～♪

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Huh, I can't even try to imagine that. 
The idea of you swinging a sword……

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Woooooh! I'm in the I clan!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
Mhm! 'Tis the first clan in the order! A great omen, I say! 
This war shall see myself, No Reason, conquer these lands!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
So loud～ I can't believe we even ended up in the same clan… 
I simply went along after she invited me out of the blue, but I 
don't feel like I'll be able to match her pace～

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Miracle! Thou'rt also in the I clan! Fear not, for our time 
shall be a merry one♪ That much I guarantee!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
—— Pardon me. It appears that 
I am of the same clan as you all.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
If I may be so brazen, I must inform you that 
I have been assigned the role of General!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Yaeno's gonna lead us, huh? Powerful～ 
Thanks for having me, General.

text_block_list.name: [I Clan] Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Umm, there are 10 people per clan… so we're complete, I think. 
Now we have to enter battles with these members to take over 
the territories of all the other clans, did I get that right?

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: 'Twould appear so! I count on thee, my compatriots! Mmmhm, this Clan Clash lights a fire in my soul!

The student body grew incredibly excited after the clan lineups 
were posted. The clans where a few well-known horsegirls were 
gathered together drew particularly high amounts of attention…

text_block_list.name: Bandwagon Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Whoaa～～! Look at those amazing lineups! 
No doubt it's gonna be between these two!

text_block_list.name: Bandwagon Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Oguri Cap is serving as the general for the Ro clan….! And she's joined by Tanino Gimlet and Symboli Kris S!

text_block_list.name: Bandwagon Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
They're both extraordinarily athletic and have incredible 
courage to boot! Crap, they're actually so intimidating! 
The glint in their eyes is enough to root me to the spot!

text_block_list.name: Bandwagon Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Then there's the Ha clan with Biwa Hayahide's intellect…….! The other members are all noteworthy racers too～!

text_block_list.name: Bandwagon Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Strategy will probably play an important role in the Clan Clash, 
so an astute general like Biwa Hayahide should massively boost 
their strength!!

text_block_list.name: Expectant Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Kyaaa～! Go for it, miss Oguri! You're almost certain to win with your lineup～!!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
The favorites for victory, huh… 
I have to hand it to Oguri, she is as popular as ever.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
I must remain diligent as well. Clan Clash or race, let us 
challenge them fair and square.

text_block_list.name: [I Clan] Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Uuuuh……. but those members…… will trying our best even give us a shot at winning……?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Well… it does feel a bit like there's not much point 
in participating if you're not that strong……?

text_block_list.name: [I Clan] Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
Nah, I think it's still meaningful to participate… 
Umm… even if we don't win……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Mmm, yeah…… guess it's fine. Besides, it's a festival, right? If it becomes too much, we can just take it easy～

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: … is… a way……

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Yaeno……?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: —— There is absolutely a way to victory!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
You all are giving up before the battle has even begun… 
This behavior is not befitting of a warrior!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
Giving up your will to fight by saying there's 
no chance of victory! Does it not frustrate you 
to resign yourselves to defeat already!?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
I… want to win! Even more so when up against such powerful 
opponents, those "favorites" I would be disregarded for…!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
(That's right… be it an event at the Fan Festival or a race… 
the outcome is never decided from the start!)

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
(If we continue to give our best without becoming impatient 
or faltering, then one day, without fail, we will surpass them!)

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: …… Ah! Excuse me, I might have spoken out of line…

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
Nay… Rightly spoken! 'Tis only a worthwhile battle 
if you win against those stronger than yourself!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I feel the same. It pisses me off thinking that we'll lose.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
I very much understand where Yaeno's coming from. 
Especially when Oguri is our opponent, right?

text_block_list.name: [I Clan] Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
R-Right… yeah… we can't give up before the fight. 
I think I might be getting more pumped up now…!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Well alright～ Shall we all give it our best then? 
I guess I'll roll up my sleeves a little as well～

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: All of you…!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much. Let us do this. This shall be our uprising!
